More Older Gamers, More Women Playing!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2003 Topics (Year of the Counter): More Older Gamers, More Women Playing!
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, August 27, 2003 - 12:37 pm:

A new study has upped the average ages for gamers, and adult women now outnumber teen boys! HERE is a link to the info.

By ChetFlavin on Wednesday, August 27, 2003 - 02:10 pm:

By Trousle on Saturday, August 30, 2003 - 10:40 am:

I never understood where people came up with the idea that women would never play video games. This is a stereotype which has no grounds for fact. Think about it ... who would be more inclined to sit in front of a TV? Wait ... nevermind. Next question ... Who enjoys all the violence they can get? Um ... no no ... next question. Who knows how to hook up the game consoles? The one who reads the manual .. in other words, women! So, yeah .. there ya go. =)

(NOTE: This is humor ... please please please see it as humor, ok? Thanks! =D)

Trousle
